name: Closed Rooms (Prototype 1)
description:
I will be sincere.

Starting a project that included more than a week of continuous work has always frightened me and, in one way or another, I have almost always abandoned the boat even before reaching the sea.
Let me be clear, the boat I jumped on was a single-seater, I never left anyone in the middle of a project other than myself.
But Edo, what does this have to do with what you want to tell us?
Well, everything!
I decided to keep track of the projects that I start in order to draw a personal evolutionary line and the project itself reducing (I think) the probability of abandonment.




The basic mechanics are very simple. The character is born in a room that does not have visible doors. Only through the map it is possible to see the doors and access them.

WASD for movements

Hold Options/Alt for Map

Mouse for Camera

Left Click to add a Door

Space to Restart
